comment.author: 45060644@N02
comment._content:
The photograph of the Third Pursuit Squadron -- Hell's Angels -- of the American Volunteer Group was probably taken from aircraft #47 on May 28, 1942 near the Salween River Gorge on the China-Burma border. The shot of P-40 Tomahawks includes #68 flown by Arvid Olson, #46 flown by Bob Prescott, and #24 flown by Ken Jernstedt.
